etymology.description: Pictogram: side view of a dog.
etymology.interpretation: Shows a side profile of a dog, with the head, legs, and tail simplified into a few strokes. Early forms were more zoomorphic; the modern shape remains an abstract outline that still evokes a dog.

examples.chinese: 我的爱犬每天陪我散步(我的愛犬每天陪我散步)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ de àiquǎn měitiān péi wǒ sànbù.
examples.english: My beloved dog accompanies me on walks every day.

examples.chinese: 警犬在机场嗅闻行李(警犬在機場嗅聞行李)。
examples.english: Police dogs sniff the luggage at the airport.

examples.chinese: 动物园里展出了多种犬类(動物園裡展出了多種犬類)。
examples.pinyin: Dòngwùyuán lǐ zhǎnchū le duō zhǒng quǎnlèi.
examples.english: The zoo showcased many kinds of canines.
